evidence.claim_text: Evidence suggests critical documents (Police Clearance Letter, LA Assessment May 2023) were available but not disclosed or examined at key decision points.

The Local Authority has failed to provide evidence that Samantha and I harmed the children; they appear to be so desperate to find a way to support their claims that they have in turn neglected their actual purpose.
She failed to provide emotional support for him, failed to even give me a photograph of his father.
The NHS and social services have failed to provide Ryan with any support, despite Dr Hunnisett’s recommendations.
evidence.filename: Response to Dr Hunnisett - Second Statement .docx

evidence.claim_text: Yet 6 months later, the LA and the PGM have still failed to provide any support to Ryan, which is neglectful.
Mr Dunmore unfairly blames me as the reason for not letting Ryan participate in football classes... Mr Dunmore does not take into consideration Ryan's needs
It is upsetting that Mr Dunmore unfairly blames me as the reason for not letting Ryan participate in football classes at a weekend, and he accuses me of not socialising Ryan.
The judge unfairly made findings that had not been sought or considered at trial (13 examples given).

Neither appeared very happy, and said that they thought it was unfair that they were having to be separated from the children. They were overheard saying to each other that it wouldn't matter what they said or did, they would not believed.
Therefore, the firm and Miss Ardern did not take unfair advantage of you via bullying and intimidation.
